description: This file defines a registration page component for a web application built with Remix framework, handling user registration logic including API calls, session management, and form rendering.

methods.name: loader
methods.description: Loads user session; redirects to /app if user is already logged in.

methods.name: action
methods.description: Handles registration form submission: validates input, registers user, logs in, and sets auth cookie.

methods.name: Register
methods.description: React component rendering registration form UI.
